annonstext:
Location: Gavle, Sweden

	3rd Level Qualification in a related field
	Experience using Revit is required
	Good knowledge of construction related disciplines

Responsibilities:

	Reporting directly to the BIM Manager/Coordinator from the project site the key responsibilities of the role include.
	Supporting BIM project set up and support for large data centre projects
	Coordinate with the BIM team, design team and external clients
	Administer BIM reports
	Coordination with cross functional departments
	Maintaining model registers
	Following BIM protocols
	Assist in using BIM authoring tools (Revit, Civil3D)
	Support the coordination/review of tools such as Navisworks to federate, coordinate, clash detect and produce reports.
	To support the use of simulation tools such as Navisworks/Synchro, aligned with project schedules/programmes to produce 4D simulations.
	An understanding of Level 2 BIM and the ability to produce deliverables required by the mandate such as BIM execution plans, MPDTs, MIDPs, COBie outputs etc
	Utilising Information Management (based on the principles of BS1192) and the use of CDEs and Data management software tools such as Viewpoint, Vault, etc.

A high level of professionalism with the ability to handle confidential information is crucial to this role. Strong time management and communication skills are essential to carry out the role as well as efficient organizational skills with the ability to administer tasks over multiple priorities. The ability to exercise good judgment in a variety of situations and comfortable working under pressure, while remaining flexible, proactive and efficient.
annonstextFormaterad:
Location: Gavle, Sweden

  • 3rd Level Qualification in a related field
  • Experience using Revit is required
  • Good knowledge of construction related disciplines

Responsibilities:

  • Reporting directly to the BIM Manager/Coordinator from the project site the key responsibilities of the role include.
  • Supporting BIM project set up and support for large data centre projects
  • Coordinate with the BIM team, design team and external clients
  • Administer BIM reports
  • Coordination with cross functional departments
  • Maintaining model registers
  • Following BIM protocols
  • Assist in using BIM authoring tools (Revit, Civil3D)
  • Support the coordination/review of tools such as Navisworks to federate, coordinate, clash detect and produce reports.
  • To support the use of simulation tools such as Navisworks/Synchro, aligned with project schedules/programmes to produce 4D simulations.
  • An understanding of Level 2 BIM and the ability to produce deliverables required by the mandate such as BIM execution plans, MPDTs, MIDPs, COBie outputs etc
  • Utilising Information Management (based on the principles of BS1192) and the use of CDEs and Data management software tools such as Viewpoint, Vault, etc.

A high level of professionalism with the ability to handle confidential information is crucial to this role. Strong time management and communication skills are essential to carry out the role as well as efficient organizational skills with the ability to administer tasks over multiple priorities. The ability to exercise good judgment in a variety of situations and comfortable working under pressure, while remaining flexible, proactive and efficient.
